short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vibheen lets you create interactive step-by-step guides with screenshots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Vibheen extension to easily capture any process while you navigate through it, once done instantly edit and share with others using links, PDFs etc.

⚡ Easy and fastest way to create and share how-to guides.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
✅ Capture: Vibheen seamlessly records every step with screenshots as you navigate through your process. No more manually taking and assembling countless screenshots; Vibheen does it all in one go.
✅ Edit: Missed a step? No problem! You can easily edit and update your workflows to make them just right.
✅ Share: Share your workflow instantly with a link or export it as a polished PDF. Vibheen makes collaboration a breeze.

WHY INTERACTIVE GUIDES?
Say goodbye to endless reading and searching through wordy guides or lengthy videos. Vibheen shows you exactly what to do, step-by-step, directly on your screen, making it easy and error-free.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE USING IT:
- Save Time: Create guides in minutes, not hours, and make life easier for your team with workflows that are quick to follow.
- Improve Accuracy: With interactive guidance, Vibheen pinpoints exactly where to click and what to do, ensuring you get it right every time.

WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH IT?
- Step-by-step guides
- Product demos
- Onboarding tutorials
- Sales pitches
- Learning and training modules
- Knowledge base management
- Customer Support

WHO IS IT FOR?
From individuals to entire teams, Vibheen is the ultimate tool for collaboration across your organization.

WHERE DOES IT WORK?
Vibheen works on any website or SaaS platform via your Chrome browser, making it perfect for capturing processes wherever you go online.
